entry.title: Sunny morning day!
entry.summary:
Hello✨ my Sunday morning~🙆🌈
🍞🍎🍵🍳🍮
Getting up from bed at 9:20am, and opening the curtain, such a big sunny day!
entry.content:
Hello✨ my Sunday morning~🙆🌈
🍞🍎🍵🍳🍮
Getting up from bed at 9:20am, and opening the curtain, such a big sunny day!

Today will start at a big super nice breakfast!
(Black tea with lemon+apple+milk jujube+ egg with green pepper sandwich).

then open the youtube channel, watching the vlogs and enjoy the meal~

Haha~my cat: price come to find me, cos the smell of the sandwich, he is supper tortoiseshell cat～🐱

Come on! My Prince~

Cute boy~

After he can't get anything, he go to enjoy the Sunday free sunshine～

I play with him then realize he like play with curtain, so curiosity a boy～

😽Getting old and enjoying the lovely life with my little price~

So everyone:

🌞
Good morning~💙💚💛💜
